class_notes: This class is for DABSN Semester 2 students only. SESSION TWO: Mar. 14-May 6. Clinical Intensives dates: TBD
course_description: This course provides clinical practicum for the theory course of either: Mental Health or Childbearing Families. Students will extend critical thinking and clinical judgment to meet the physical, psychosocial, cultural, and spiritual needs of clients and families in the clinical area.
